abstract: Julio Arrieta joined Lopez Negrete Communications, Houston, as executive group account director on the Verizon account, which the agency was awarded last year.
snippet: Julio Arrieta joined Lopez Negrete Communications, Houston, as executive group account director on the Verizon account, which the agency was awarded last year.
lead_paragraph: Julio Arrieta joined Lopez Negrete Communications, Houston, as executive group account director on the Verizon account, which the agency was awarded last year. He had most recently been chief marketing officer at Blue Casa Communications, Santa Barbara, Calif.

headline.main: Accounts and People of Note in the Ad Industry
